title: Moonlight
lyrics: (Baekhyun) Yeah ( Stop Stop Stop Stop) (Baekhyun) Oh Hoo~ 'Stop Stop Stop Stop (D.O) Gipeojin haru teum sai neoneun joyonghi dagawa Eodumeul geodeonaego naui jameul kkaewo Geurigon meoreojyeo (yeollin changmun jeo neomeoro) (Baekhyun) Tto gireul irheotna, neon, neon, neon. Bamgonggiga ajik chagawo ireona So, baby, hold on neol honja dugiga (Nan geokjeongi dwae) georil dugo neoui dwireul ttaraga 'Neon ssodajineun dalbiche syawo (D.O) Geu hwanghorhan pyojeongeun bon jeogi eopseo 'Geurimcheoreom meomchun nega boyeo (Baekhyun) Geu siseonkkeuten  'Daheul suga eomtneun an-gil sudo eomtneun got 'Sumyeon wie bichin geon geu sarami aniya (Baekhyun) Irwojil su eomtneun seulpeun neoui story gakkawojilsurok deo apajil teni 'Geu sarangmaneun stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah 'Geu sarangmaneun stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah (Baekhyun) Ireoke naega neol aetage bulleo 'Dagagaji ma, babe (Baekhyun) Geu nalgaega jeojeuni (D.O) Amuri malhaedo neon deulliji anha Dasi geuege on momeul deonjyeo wae neon wiheomhan kkumeul kkulkka 'ije geuman jichin Neol baraboneun nae mamdo jjijeojil geot gateunde 'Neon ssodajineun dalbiche syawo ((Baekhyun) Uh hu~) (Baekhyun) Geu hwanghorhan pyojeongeun bon jeogi eopseo 'Geurimcheoreom meomchun nega boyeo (D.O) Geu siseonkkeuten 'Daheul suga eomtneun an-gil sudo eomtneun got Sumyeon wie bichin geon geu sarami aniya (D.O) Irwojil su eomtneun seulpeun neoui story gakkawojilsurok deo apajil teni 'Geu sarangmaneun stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah Geu sarangmaneun stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah (D.O) Ireoke naega neol aetage bulleo ((Baekhyun) Oh~) 'dagagaji ma, babe (Baekhyun) geu nalgaega jeojeuni (D.O) Neon amu il eopdeon geotcheoreom aesseo nareul hyanghae useo boyeodo Ganyeorin saehayan neoui eokkaega jogeumake tteollyeowa, I'm telling you (Baekhyun) Jamsiman naui gyeoteseo naeryeonoko swieogado dwae Meondongi teumyeon jeo dari jeomuneun geu goseul ttara geuttaen naraga, yeah 'Daheul suga eomneun hamkke hal su eomneun got ((Baekhyun) Oh Woo~ Woo~) 'Bami doemyeon nara on geugeon nega aniya 'Irwojil su eomneun ((Baekhyun) Nunmul heulleo) 'Gakkawojilsurok deo apajil teni ((Baekhyun) I swear I cannot stop loving) 'Geu sarangmaneum... Stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah ((Baekhyun) Tonight) 'Geu sarangmaneum... Stop, stop, stop, stop, yeah ((Baekhyun) Tonight) (D.O) Ireoke naega neol aetage bulleo 'Meoreojiji ma, babe (D.O) Geu nalgaega jeojeuni ( electric guitar starts) (Baekhyun) geu nalgaega jeojeuni   ( ...fades out...)
